alert.note: Alert for Cambria; Clearfield (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 9:24AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT PARTS OF CLEARFIELD AND CAMBRIA COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 923 AM EDT, a snow squall was along a line extending from 13 miles east of Punxsutawney to 14 miles northeast of Indiana to near Homer City and moving southeast at 25 MPH. THIS SQUALL WILL BE NEAR... Northern Cambria around 940 AM EDT. Hastings around 945 AM EDT. Carrolltown around 950 AM EDT. Patton around 955 AM EDT. Johnstown, Ebensburg and Westmont around 1000 AM EDT. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
